articles.title: Automated clearance to be the norm for all travellers into Singapore from 2023: ICA - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): From next year, all travellers will be able to use automated lanes upon arrival into Singapore for faster immigration clearance, said the Immigration and Checkpoints Authority (ICA) on Tuesday (Feb 15).
